TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void DownloadStringCompletedEventHandler(object sender, DownloadStringCompletedEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed DownloadStringCompletedEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub DownloadStringCompletedEventHandler(sender As Object, e As DownloadStringCompletedEventArgs)
public delegate void DownloadStringCompletedEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, DownloadStringCompletedEventArgs ^ e);
type DownloadStringCompletedEventHandler = delegate of obj * DownloadStringCompletedEventArgs -> unit

param.name: e
param.span: in cui sono contenuti i dati dell'evento.

summary.span: Rappresenta il metodo che gestirà l'evento di un oggetto .

span.span: Represents the method that will handle the event of a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks Quando si crea un delegato , si identifica il metodo che gestirà l'evento.When you create a delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event. Per associare l'evento al gestore eventi in uso, aggiungere all'evento un'istanza del delegato.To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. Il gestore eventi viene chiamato ogni volta che si verifica l'evento, a meno che non venga rimosso il delegato.The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate. Per altre informazioni sui delegati del gestore eventi, vedere [la gestione e generazione di eventi](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).For more information about event handler delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples Il codice seguente viene illustrato il download di una stringa in modo asincrono.The following code example demonstrates downloading a string asynchronously. [!code-cpp[NCLWebClientAsync#28](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/CPP/asyncmethods.cpp#28)] [!code-csharp[NCLWebClientAsync#28](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/CS/asyncmethods.cs#28)] [!code-vb[NCLWebClientAsync#28](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/VB/asyncmethods.vb#28)] Il metodo seguente viene chiamato al termine del download.The following method is called when the download completes. [!code-cpp[NCLWebClientAsync#29](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/CPP/asyncmethods.cpp#29)] [!code-csharp[NCLWebClientAsync#29](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/CS/asyncmethods.cs#29)] [!code-vb[NCLWebClientAsync#29](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/VB/asyncmethods.vb#29)]
